name: ToporFlop
0:
”Alexa open top or flop”
”Alexa ask top or flop to play the best action movies”
”Alexa ask top or flop to start a multiplayer game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top or flop
des:
In various categories, such as the worlds highest paid celebrities or the biggest LEGO sets, I present you properties of two objects at a time. Do you know which one is TOP and which is FLOP?

How TOP or FLOP works
===================

In various categories you compete against other players worldwide. Can you make it to the top of the rankings? Collect points by answering questions correctly. If you answer a question incorrectly, you loose a life. You start with two lives and after correctly answering every tenth question you receive an extra life. If you don't have any lives left, the round ends and you move on to the leaderboard. 

It's also possible to play locally against up to eight of your friends.

Let's play TOP or FLOP!


Game Categories
=============

- The worlds highest paid celebrities -
In this category you need to know if the income of a celebrity is higher (Top) or lower (Flop) than that of another celebrity.

- The biggest LEGO sets -
In this category you have to know if a LEGO set contains more (top) or less (flop) pieces than another one.

- The best action movies -
In this category you have to know if the rating of an action movie is better (Top) or worse (Flop) than that of another movie.

- The best PlayStation 4 games -
In this category you have to know if the rating of a PlayStation 4 game is better (Top) or worse (Flop) than that of another game.


Game Modes
==========

- Singleplayer -
Play solo and climb up various category rankings.

- Multiplayer -
Play locally against up to eight friends.


Other
=====

- All movie and game data comes from Forbes and Metacritic
- All LEGO data comes from Brickset
- Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
